name: Flytech Air Hostess Academy
about: Flytech International is Nepal's No.1 Airhostess Training Academy, certified by ISO 9001:2015 for its Quality Management System. Located in Kathmandu, it is the first internationally recognized airhostess academy in Nepal, accredited by the International Accreditation Organization (IAO-USA). Flytech offers courses such as International Diploma in Airhostess Training, Basic Airhostess Training, and Makeover & Grooming Training, all based on IATA and ICAO Cabin Crew Syllabus. With a stellar placement record, Flytech has placed hundreds of students in leading international and domestic airlines. The academy features state-of-the-art facilities, including aircraft mock-up classrooms and virtual experience of Airbus and Boeing aircraft. Its faculty consists of highly trained and certified professionals, ensuring students receive top-notch education and placement assistance. Flytech is committed to making dreams come true for aspiring airhostesses.
